LJava
Class LJMap

java.lang.Object
  LJava.LJMap

public class LJMap
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
Tzali Maimon The map that holds all the answers to the queries activated within LJ. This map is returned from most Lazy objects as well.

It can be used for user's purposes as well to manage data and a progressive use of LJ.

NOTE: THIS CLASS ISN'T ENTRIELY BUT ONLY PARTIALLY THREAD-SAFE. READ THE METHODS DESCRIPTIONS!

getVals

public final java.lang.Object getVals(Variable v)
thread safe but note that the returned Object is the actual list of values of the variable. changing that list will effect the LJMap

Parameters:
v - - a variable
Returns:
The List of values of v or undefined if cannot find the variable

getConstraint

public final java.lang.Object getConstraint(Variable v)
thread safe but pay attention that the constraint returned is the actual constraint of the variable. Constraint is immutable so this makes this method thread-safe

Parameters:
v - - a variable
Returns:
the constraint of v or undefined if cannot find the variable

getVars

public final java.util.HashSet<Variable> getVars()
Thread safe.

Returns:
the variables that appear in this map.

toString

public final java.lang.String toString()
Overrides:

get

public final Variable[] get(int index,
                            Variable... vs)
Parameters:
index - - index of the required answer
vs - - the order of variables that is wanted
Returns:
the objects that appear in the map according to the order of Variables in vs. undefined is returned if the variable isn't found or doesn't have an answer in the place index.
